channel.title: nginx on My personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on My personal blog

item.title: installing the nchan module for nginx on a gentoo based system
item.description: I recently encountered a requirement that could be fulfilled by the nchan module for nginx. nchan does provide prebuilt packages for Archlinux, Debian, Ubuntu and Fedora. Sadly, there is nothing there for gentoo users. So I directly skipped ahead to the “build from source” section. The instructions where pretty basic: clone the github repo configure nginx with ./configure –add-module=path/to/nchan build For me this lead to the following result:
